website_summaries.verdict: A highly versatile, adjustable bed tray with many uses. Well-constructed and easy to set up, whether used for eating or working on.
pros: Includes folding laptop stand, and conveniently placed storage drawer for small items
Recessed cup holder keeps your cup from slipping around
Adjustable legs are a welcome addition
cons: May be too large for some

customer_reviews.title: Center panel badly warped!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop desk a few weeks ago and although heavy I thought it would work great. I've not even used it yet. It has been folded up and laying on a carpeted floor. I just purchased a laptop, picked up this desk and saw that just since I received it, the center panel had hideously warped! I cannot use it and will be returning it as soon as I figure out how! On the closed up picture you can see where the layers have split apart! Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: It is one of the best items that I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this lapdesk for the last 3 months. It is one of the best items that I have purchased. The quality is excellent. The cons previously noted on other reviews have been fixed. I wanted a lapdesk to use with my iPad and this was the perfect choice for me. I think it's one of the largest desks currently available on Amazon, which is just what I wanted. I am so happy with the desk, I decided to write this review, I consider it money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Elina Blanco

customer_reviews.title: I love that the laptop section is in the middle so ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that the laptop section is in the middle so I can rest my hands on either side. Originally had ordered the one with the laptop section on the left and felt unbalanced. Legs are adjustable, but are plenty high already.
customer_reviews.author: Dezz

customer_reviews.title: A great little table
customer_reviews.text: A great little table. I use it more as a TV tray. I have some beanbag couches around my TV and I wanted something low enough to accommodate how low I was sitting. This table looks great, not cheap at all, and can be adjusted easily. It is stable. Just be careful if you try to slid it to the left or right because the legs will collapse. I can see this as being potentially catastrophic if you had a drink beside a laptop and tried to push this desk a little to your right or something.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Functional- it can be improved
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product 4 stars because the workmanship did not meet my expectations. 1. The magnetic latch was installed too high that elevated the middle part caused uneven surface table. 2. Imprecise cut on the extended legs caused trouble to tighten the bolts. However, it’s functional but not to my satisfaction because this product can be improved such as: 1. Make the little drawer longer enough to store the pens and pencils 2. Cut out completely a circle where it designated for placing a drinking object. Once it become an empty circle, It will be easier for holding a drinking object.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: It could have been special
customer_reviews.text: Well the pictures sure make this laptop stand look nice. Right up until you decide to place your hands under the thing to pick it up and you pull back a couple slivers. Or better yet you catch your favorite shirt on one of the snags and well it just doesn't make you happy. Better QA would go along ways to serving the customer...
customer_reviews.author: Jason Valls

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: First one received. was defective, with one missing screw and broken part where the magnet sits. I returned it right away and yes, the seller responded right away with a replacement in no time, great customer service. No complaints at all, it's just perfect for big laptops, I love I can store a small notebook and pens on the drawer. The space on both sides is great. I strongly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: great lap desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a laptop desk while I was recovering from knee surgery. This has a wonderful leg clearance and I was able to ice my knee with ease. The cup holder isn't really a cup holder but rather an indentation that isn't really big enough for a cup but I didn't use it anyway. I love having the room on both sides as I was able to put a small plate on the left side while using the right as a mouse pad. The riser is great too, I don't use it much but when I do, it works wonderfully. My cat loves to sleep under it when I am not using it, so it's dual purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: delightful product as an alternative from sitting on a chair at a desk
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty and practical, with the cut out flowers and bamboo construction. I sit all day at my laptop for work. Now that I am working from home during the pandemic and even other activities are online, I sit even more. I use this desk to sit and work from the floor in lotus position, which is good for posture and circulation. The drawer is small but useful for a pen, flash drive, eraser, etc.. The only imperfection is that the seems between the parts don't lay perfectly, but unless you were drawing or writing on a single sheet of paper on the surface, it is not bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great for a large lapdesk
customer_reviews.text: Great for a large lapdesk. The drawer is basically useless (can only fit a pencil at an angle, and maybe two pencils deep... don't plan to store a mouse in it!), and it can easily fall open when picked up with that end downwards because it just has a weak magnet to keep it shut. But the finish is nice, even if the lifting center piece doesn't line up perfectly smooth when closed. The size is the best part, as I can sit indian style under it and I'm 6'2" and 230lbs. I have room for my 17.4" laptop and a mouse, so I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stansfield

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews, but I had to one this product. It is very nice and sturdy and just what I was needing while traveling. I watch a lot of Netflix and just piddle around on the internet, but I am usually somewhere that there is not a desk so this works perfectly. My only issue is that it is rough in some spots and I have gotten a splinter already, the paperwork with the desk states that it is common for the desk to not be completely smooth. But for the price you would think they could seal it, smooth it out or something to prevent splinters. Just my opinion. I would def purchase again though.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: So great! I love this desk so much!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love that this product is very sturdy. The one issue I had is that the stopper that prevents the laptop from sliding was loose and it often fell off when I moved the desk between rooms. I put glue dots into the holes to prevent that from happening. I like that I can extend the legs and that I can store pens and post it notes in the side drawer. This is such an ideal design and product!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Best when improved by you, but otherwise fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this table I was so plesantly surprised. I thought it would be like a regular breakfast in bed table, but it's so wide, and I can easily place my drawing tablet on one side to doodle. I'm a bit worried about the wire proping and the safety stopper, and yes it does need a little sanding when adjusting the center piece, but otherwise I'm in love! The safety stopper is actually in the drawer, which I did not know at first. I was searching around my bedroom looking for it, but it was safe and sound! I'm sure this sturdy table will last me years, though I will admit it needs some improvement
customer_reviews.author: Diana Soto

customer_reviews.title: as described.....exellently does the job expected.....AAAAA
customer_reviews.text: first of all, the width and hight allow for reasonable leg movement when set onto the bed, contrary to the narrower and lower trays on the market. Secondly, the item is well finished and esthetically pleasing as well as fully funktional. ,The extra width on both sides of the tilt up proves as welcomed space for the purpose on decides on as does the little drawer.........(keeping my toothpick handy). Drawer and center portion are indeed held in place by a magnet. For my purpose used, the item fits the bill to a T. Therefore, I do recommend this flexible multipurpose bed-tray.
customer_reviews.author: Viennese needing space

customer_reviews.title: Where would you use this?
customer_reviews.text: I tried to take this with my between places I visited and it became a hassle. I wouldn't say it's portable. On the bed, if your leg is near on of the table legs, it because uneven due to the weight. I do enjoy working on the floor with it. I also use it as a small table to eat. I say max 3 people can eat on it, you can push it to 4. If there is only one bowl each 🤣. For me the fan holes were unnecessary because i have a mac. I really enjoy the cup holder for some odd reason
customer_reviews.author: Viv Wong

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice. Only complaint is that they put plastic screw tighteners on the legs ( to lock the legs in place at the correct height ) one of mine stripped right away trying to tighten it. That being said a hardware store will have metal ones to substitute for maybe $2 for all 4. It is worth the money as that seems to be the only cheap crap they put on the table. It’s pretty nice as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it long enough to give a through review. It seems to work well, the quality of the wood is better and sturdier than the other tray by them are. I have not used the expandable height feature- which I saw numerous complaints about, and the end little drawer is a great little feature...if it had enough friction to STAY SHUT!! it becomes more of a negative. I will come back and update this review when I use the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Denice L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but a bit finicky
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to do my best to relay this information properly. My friend had me order this for her, so I haven't used this myself, but she told me she would review this product as 4/5 stars. She said it's a great desk, which she likes to use for her studies while sitting in bed. However, she said she doesn't like how, when it's folded up and not in use, and she goes to pick it up, if she picks it up from a specific side, it unlatches and comes open very suddenly before she is ready for it to open, and that's annoying to her. Other than that, she has no qualms with this product and likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Warps
customer_reviews.text: It's great because it's the only one in it's width and height, but after a week the center panel warped just like other reviewers. 2 months later, the legs snapped on one side
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This desk is approved by my chihuahua, Teddy, ...
customer_reviews.text: Update nov 2017, I am now looking into another desk because this one is a bit too high to be comfortable in bed on my shoulders. Also the lowest setting on the not flat mode is wayyyy to high. And it’s doesnt lock it’s legs in position and flops over sometimes. Good quality wood and large but became cumbersome. This desk is approved by my chihuahua, Teddy, as he can now sit in my lap while I use the computer, instead of being forced to move. In evil chihuahua terms that is a C-, as the human slave should still not be working on the computer, but for Amazon rating purposes A+.
customer_reviews.author: VKaplan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop desk. Bought it for school so I could study on my bed and/or futon. I originally bought one that only had the area for the laptop and one additional section on the right side but decided to return it for this one (two additional sections on the left and right side of the laptop section and so so happy I did. Came on time, easy to use, sturdy, love that the laptop section can be adjusted as desired. One con, I always use the laptop adjustment on the lowest setting, other than that, it's too high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you work or read at night in bed, this is a game changer
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of work and reading at night before bed. I was getting neck pain from always looking down at my books or laptop. This has been the perfect solution. The legs are adjustable, and the top is made for left or right handed people. This nice as I'm a lefty and my son is a righty and we are sharing this. Study and really pretty. It folds up easily and nicely when not in use. No more neck pain, and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella E. Bertelli

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and lacks basic features like locking legs
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this version falls short. It lacks leg locks so if you move the legs collapse. The fold up middle section is mis-aligned greatly on the top so its far from smooth. Really cheaply made to the point it probably won't last more than a month or so of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Due to COVID-19 I have been working from home and I bought a portable monitor because working with one monitor simply doesn't cut it and I needed a table that would be strong and wide enough to hold both and also that I can use in bed and this thing is exactly what the doctor ordered. It fits my 13 inch Mac Book Pro and my 15.6 inch MSI portable monitor side by side.
customer_reviews.author: RuMaDlOl

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I originally bought this for my boyfriend ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I originally bought this for my boyfriend because he wanted to play with his laptop in bed and on the couch. He has an 18" gaming laptop and this supports is. The left-hand/right-hand option makes the desk extra wide, good for a big laptop. I do not think I would trust leaning an expensive, large laptop up on the tilting part of the desk (though it might work.) I like to hi-jack this from him to do homework in bed and take it in the bathtub! I've also used it for breakfast in bed. Very versatile and a great size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is GREAT. My laptop is 17
customer_reviews.text: larger than I thought it would be, which is GREAT. My laptop is 17.3 inches and it fits comfortably in the center with a spot for both my drink and my wireless mouse's mouse pad. Had a weird smell I attribute to all bamboo products I've gotten, kind of like vinegar, so I sprayed it with some "Pure citrus" oil and that took care of it. Very happy with the product and I got the 3 year warranty plan for it, just in case. Edit: I've had the table about 3 weeks and the part that pops up is starting to warp and bow.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Johengen

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have a small one, but this is so much better! I love the adjustable leg height and top. My laptop doesn't overheat any more
customer_reviews.author: sue e horst

customer_reviews.title: practical, well made, 100% wood
customer_reviews.text: Generous size that actually holds a laptop and a decent sized plate.100% bamboo, no fake wood. Several adjusting heights. Also due to its unusually wide size I can sit underneath it with my legs crossed. I'm not crazy about the fan cooling cut-outs; in case you are using this without a laptop then you don't have that surface to use as a normal tabletop. I will also likely add a lower setting (with a few minutes and saw) to prop the laptop on less of an angle than is possible with available settings. Awesome product. Adds to the luxury of being able to have a snack in bed, watch movies, and even get work done in a leisurely way.
customer_reviews.author: autodidact

customer_reviews.title: Great with one exception
customer_reviews.text: Got this so I could still work after surgery. It's very nice quality. The only complaint is have is that there aren't any locks holding the legs in place. It's not an issue when you are using it, but when you move it one side can give way and you laptop can get slammed a bit
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great lapdesk at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This tray/lap desk is lightweight and well made. The legs, without raising the tabletop, provide me more than enough room for sitting cross legged under the tray. It does have plastic screws to raise the table height but they are plastic and I don't think they would hold up for anything of significant weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Long enough to fit all my junk.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I'm a lazy jerk and love sitting on my couch or in my bed to draw/type/web surf versus sitting upright at a desk with proper posture. I considered buying a full size desk, but don't really have the room in our apartment right now. I got this one specifically because the dimensions. It's longer than most of the standard ones that fit just a laptop. This one is a "lap desk" and fits not only my 13" MacBook but my 6" Wacom tablet and a drink (it has a cup holder). It's nifty. I dig it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would give more stars bcan’t use for intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent tray, even with this issue. My computer can’t sit on it without it rocking back and forth, it’s bowed in the center so we just use it as a tray and not for its actual intended purpose upon purchase. We do have to be careful when putting drinks down because it will spill... Poor Rockstar, so thankful you didn’t spill on my computer...
customer_reviews.author: Mind Your Own Business

customer_reviews.title: bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I received it today and so far it is perfect. it does not have any damage or anything. Its quality look cheap for the price, but I checked other items and they are not cheap as well. At least, this one has more functions. And also it is really big which is perfect for me because while using my laptop I also can take notes. If I have any problems, I will edit.
customer_reviews.author: Elis

customer_reviews.title: Well made laptop desk
customer_reviews.text: I am happy the product arrived completely undamaged. It didn’t require an assembly which was great. It Is sturdy and definitely has some weight to it. My 6 yr old daughter would not be able to carry it. I love it’s portability, minimalist style, and the smooth natural bamboo material. I’m very pleased with my purchase considering my family is working and schooling from home and I don’t need to invest in multiple desks and chairs. What I especially love about this one is that it Accommodates left or right handed people. The cup holder and mini drawer is an extra cute touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I was originally concerned that this desk would not fit over my lap because I'm not a small woman, but once I received it, that concern was put to rest. I absolutely love this desk. I use it for my large 17" dell laptop, eating and playing cards. My 8 yr old uses it daily as well for coloring and playing with her small toys.
customer_reviews.author: MommyOfZaria

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed and beautifully constructed bed tray. The book rest is removable and can be stored in the little drawer so that it isn't in the way when you want to type or write. The adjustable height makes this bed tray comfortable for most people regardless of size. The vented top is great for keeping your laptop from overheating. The tilt action always keeps reading material at the perfect angle. There is even a little indentation to rest your glass and keep condensation contained. This tray is wider than most and the centered hinge mechanism makes it a good choice for right or left handed people. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!!!! BUY THIS ONE.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bamboo table for my daughter for Christmas. She LOVES it. It is high quality, sturdy, extremely functionable and asthetically nice to look at. The cutouts on the tilt up on the table are really nice and allow the computer to breathe. She uses her table all the time, so it has taken alot of wear and tear. It still looks and responds like new after seven months of use. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a nice laptop table for chairs or beds. I give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: C Marie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Had to get this for days I had to work from home with migraines. It came in handy while pregnant as I was sick the entire first half. Now wfh indefinitely because of covid it's been a great tool as I'm exclusively breastfeeding and working from my bed again. Recently started using the lift and the piece of wood is holding my Macbook Pro up just fine. It is a little heavy but that's ok since it's sturdy enough for everything I need at arms reach - Macbook Pro, Mouse + Notebook/Pen.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: sits nicely and has a strong feel to it
customer_reviews.text: It really is a well constructed item, sits nicely and has a strong feel to it. My only misgiving (while slight) is that the central part is not perfectly flush with the side where you put your mouse and I find my mouse hitting up against the edge periodically. In games that is annoying, but for a more casual use it would not matter at all.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop desk. Makes using my computer in bed a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: I use this Laptop desk almost daily and it has exceeded my expectations. It stays stable when working on my laptop in bed, there has never been a problem with the legs collapsing or the desk tipping. The desk is a great size for me to put my laptop, mouse, paperwork etc. on and yet doesn't interfere with my husbands comfort {King-size bed). Was hoping to find a good use for the small drawer, but so far haven't. It fits on the loose side and can rattle, so I have secured it closed for now. Still this hasn't detracted from my satisfaction. Great little desk.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Arentz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for students or those who work from home!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk to study long hours in medical school. It is very sturdy, and much larger than others on the market. There is enough room for my drink, a book, a mouse and a laptop! This desk is an absolute must have for the work from home student in a small space. My only "complaint" is that it's very very heavy and it is difficult to move off and on. However, thats just what you get with a solid wood desk. I don't use the tilting, but I imagine it would be nice for reading.The little tab is removable, so it's just flat. The price is perfect and the product works just as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery and this tray came in quite handy for my meals being served on or when I was able to read a book or for my laptop. It also came in handy for keeping my cats off my sensitive tummy area. I only gave 4 stars because the tray is heavy for someone who's had surgery and had to rely on family members to set on me and remove from me. Also, it is very nice looking and I liked the features although I never used the slide out drawer for anything.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Consider another brand
customer_reviews.text: The first time I recieved this product it was broken and had obviously used. When I recieved the replacement, it is still not the quality I expected. The wood is unfinished in some places and needs to be sanded if you don't enjoy getting splinters, and the part that lifts up is not square and has to be shoved down to get it back in line with the rest of the table top when you want to use it as a flat surface again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Long

customer_reviews.title: Great Tray!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific tray for computer, eating, etc! It's large enough to cross my legs under and is perfect for a larger person such as myself! It is a bit weighty but even I can lift it up with one hand. The adjustable legs come in really handy and having the wood block that prevents things from sliding off in the middle is great because you don't have to strain one arm to reach the keys on your keyboard! I would definitely recommend this tray!
customer_reviews.author: Bluejay

customer_reviews.title: Wide enough to comfortably work on
customer_reviews.text: This is just the laptop desk I was looking for. It is wide enough to hold my laptop, mouse pad, and drink and still not feel cramped. I like that it slant up so the laptop can be up at an angle for easier viewing. I also like the little "lip" you can put in to keep your laptop or book from slipping off. This was useful when my toddler was working on the computer near me on the couch. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tpeters314

customer_reviews.title: The size of this desk is still fine, but the lock of the feet is not ...
customer_reviews.text: The size of this desk is still fine, but the lock of the feet is not very tight. Also, the bar between the feet is not that stable and they are glued together. After a couple month, it dropped, and I have to glue it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Chu

customer_reviews.title: A Great portable desk (f you are not short!)
customer_reviews.text: Well made, item, but I am only 5'4" and it doesn't go low enough for me to use. Other than being to high for me, I really like it. If you are taller and looking for a desk like this, I highly recommend it! It folds up and stores easily. I just wish this company would make the legs adjustable to a lower level.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Voss

customer_reviews.title: The best one!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different bed trays, including this model with the laptop portion on the left side. I like this one the best because everything is centered, I still have room to put my pencils on the right while I'm coloring in bed. My tablet will hook over the top when it is raised, and it worked well with my laptop. The one thing they could do better is properly sand the edges of the middle portion that raises up as it is quite rough, & I will have to take some sandpaper to it to avoid splinters.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger laptops
customer_reviews.text: I have a large gaming laptop that I like to use in bed, but it gets very warm sitting on my lap. This laptop desk is perfect! I love that the middle section raises up because it gives me room for a drink or mouse on the flat surface. Over the past several months I have accidentally dropped this a few times and it has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Lapdesk for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and sturdiness of this lap desk. It is a good height and is solidly made. My 17.3" laptop fits quite comfortably on it without sliding around. The cut-outs help keep the computer and your lap cool. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because of the little drawer - it doesn't stay closed when you move around. I usually tape it shut or just pull it out completely while I'm working on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Light yet strong
customer_reviews.text: Bot because of the light weight yet sturdiness of bamboo, and the size. I have a large laptop with and extra fan, USB hub, and mouse to the sides, and this provides space for all. Love the little curb on the front to keep the laptop from sliding off. The drawer is a bonus for pencils and the occasional cough drop.
customer_reviews.author: Anfahr

customer_reviews.title: Just What I was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: After years of falling asleep while reading or working in my armchair at home, I realized I was just too comfortable. Sitting on the floor is better for my breathing and posture, which helps me stay alert.This little desk was a really smart purchase for me. Thanks to its relatively small size and light wood, I can read books, write notes or type on my laptop anywhere I take it. At the time of this writing, I haven't had it long enough to comment on its durability. I imagine, though that it will last over time. The desk arrived on time and in perfect condition. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: AKS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for using my laptop on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I love using this for my laptop when I want to sit on the floor (I usually prefer sitting on the floor). I don't know that the fan cutouts are necessary, but it's fine that they are there. I also use it for eating etc. Super handy, and I love that I can just collapse it flat and slide it under the bed when it is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Cooling Fans
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. I was quick to order this because I had purchased a smaller one from this maker which had a built-in fan but this one does not have fans and I thought it did. Keeping a laptop as cool as possible is essential and this one does not do that.
customer_reviews.author: Cornell Washington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: You can adjust how high it is,can light the middle piece and a stopper to prevent your laptop from falling, a little indent for a couple or something else,and the little cubby looks a bit small but its cute,I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Laptop desk is sturdy and the bamboo is most attractive. I have encountered one splinter. It is fine for use on soft surfaces as well as hard surfaces. The legs are expandable and the height is comfortable for typing in a standing position. The center position can be slanted in a number of tilted positions and is perfect for tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love products made from responsible sourced materials such as bamboo. The desk looks stylish and it is extremely well made. It is a little heavy, but it is wood after all. I'd definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevia

customer_reviews.title: thank god someone thinks about the lefties!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be too long. From the other pics it looks incredibly long. I have a twin size bed. A twin size bed is 38 inches wide. This table is 33 inches wide. You can see by my pic that it was just fits comfortably. People complain about the small drawer. I don't mind it. It'll hold pens, pencils, small random office items. Great space for your legs. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Esme

customer_reviews.title: Great work area for the bed
customer_reviews.text: Looking for work space for kids to do distant learning, etc. in bed. Large work area and sturdy legs for use on the bed. Love the little side drawer to keep pencil handy. don't use the pop up holder very much, but nice feature to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jodee M. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and wide. definitely made with good materials
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Material is sturdy and a bit heavy but I dont mind. I love how its wide that I can place other things besides my laptop. Though I did notice the unevenness of the middle surface but not much, I still think its a great product. Happy buyer here.
customer_reviews.author: khai

customer_reviews.title: ... has helped make my charting process so much more comfortable! I like the size and the little drawer ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a home health nurse and this product has helped make my charting process so much more comfortable! I like the size and the little drawer is convient. The size makes it easy to fit my computer and paperwork AND a cup of coffee on. The ability to raise the middle part makes it multi functional for other uses too. It can pitch if you don’t watch your fingers when moving it, but that seems like that should be common knowledge with bendy parts. I think it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: DBoss01

customer_reviews.title: Functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, Yes. A bit heavy for a 78 years. Not a complaint rather an incentive to build the muscles. Haven't had a chance to fully see in operation, performance and functionality. So may be more after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Patel

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not the right desk for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and the appearance, but in the end, it was a bit too bulky for what I needed. As others have noted, it was very rough on the underside, I got a couple of small slivers from it. If I had kept it, I could have just used some fine sandpaper to fix it, but it wasn't what I was looking for. Excellent return service.
customer_reviews.author: B. Borkent

customer_reviews.title: I love so many things about this tray and wanted to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love so many things about this tray and wanted to love all of it but just couldn't because it kept tipping over when I got in and out of bed. The answer may be that in needs to be deeper by about 3-7 inches. That would also give more room for a wider more useable drawer. Sign me up for that one!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Be Free

customer_reviews.title: Matches its product description.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: •Easy to assemble •good size •sturdy •thoughtful design •smooth finish - no nails sticking out CONS: The shallow drawer sticks - it’s not finished properly. Be aware it can only hold a pencil or two. Overall: I would recommend this lapdesk.
customer_reviews.author: LAGO

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is light, easy to use and unlike other lap desks, you can really stretch your legs with this one since the sides are not closed off/solid. It is compact when folded making it nice and slim and the wood is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well designed!
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and often need to change up where I'm sitting to refocus. This tray table is nice in appearance, provides ventilation for my laptop with openings in the center, and offers several different heights at which you can prop up the middle for angled reading or working. It also has convenient drawers from both the left and right sides, and a cup holder divot. The only thing I'd do to improve the design is create a sturdier cup holder (for when pets jump on the bed), and provide a slightly less steep first angle for propping up a device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: So Nice I'm Buying it Twice.
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. I'm 6'4 280lbs and it adjusts around my thighs just fine. She uses it for breakfast/dinner, reading or working in bed. I purchased it originally to game in the living room on the big screen (PC masterace issues). We both love it. The cup holder is a pluse. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: it's a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and complete. Item is as advertised, though a bit bigger than I had thought it would be. I use it everyday for doing homework and playing on my computer in bed. I keep the tray flat because it's a little high when raised even at the lowest setting. Overall, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Riki Kiki Taco

customer_reviews.title: Has MANY uses!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid and exactly what I needed to do homework, not lose my pens anymore, and it doubles as A PAPER CUTTER. I had the center elevated and a sheet of paper on one side, the tray lowered more abruptly than anticipated and it sliced my paper clean. I swear I even heard the knife like sound of it's newfound chopping action. I fear for my digits. Overall, it's phenomenal in function and aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: AHowell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for because I use a mouse with my laptop but I also wanted to have room on both sides of a computer, for notebook or other things. This is perfect for just that. My bed is a full and there's still room width wise, so it doesn't cover the full width of the bed. Was not aware the lip that holds the laptop from sliding off was removable so had a little panic attack that it was missing, but it's kept in the little side drawer. Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: and is well made and sturdy. It also stands and works well if you ...
customer_reviews.text: It was larger than i had imagined - would be too wide to fit over a regular sofa if you are laying sideways. However, it sits well over a table or floor or any other hard surface, has adjustable heights, and is well made and sturdy. It also stands and works well if you want to work in bed.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, quite functional. Because it's real bamboo, have to be careful how it is stored (humidity, flat, etc.) Drawer is handy, legs adjustable and a stable unit. Recommend as a gift or to use as a standing desk option.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Nice little desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my desk, and it works great. I would prefer if it were a little taller, but it works fine as is and you cannot beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Garza

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We use it every day! It performs as advertised...takes up a little more space in a Queen Size Bed, but for one person it is superbly sized, sturdy and great for crafts!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Brill

customer_reviews.title: This lap desk is perfect! I'm sorry I didn't purchase it sooner
customer_reviews.text: Worth EVERY penny! I purchased this because I am in bed a lot due to a leg injury. I'm a college student with tons of homework and reading assignments in big bulky textbooks. This lap desk is perfect! I'm sorry I didn't purchase it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: LRodz

customer_reviews.title: It is really a good size and the legs are adjustable for height
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk so that I could sit on the couch and do homework. It is really a good size and the legs are adjustable for height, which is nice. I just wish that the legs locked because if you move the table abruptly, it collapses.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hazzan

customer_reviews.title: This is great and can even fit two lap tops side by ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great and can even fit two lap tops side by side. I use every day. The only thing I could say is it should have lower settings but the wood is tight so you can pretty much angle it the way you want. The drawer is a little small (shallow) to fit more than 2-3 pens but it works and is a nice feature. Looks nice and is a great bed tray and or serving tray:)
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaShops

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop or craft table tray
customer_reviews.text: My husband and initially purchased one each and liked them so much we purchased two more of the larger size and now have one set for the house and one for our RV. When our son came home from college he kept taking one of ours so we had to get him one as well. Works great with you laptop, keeping it and you lap cool.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this table to convert my cubicle desk to stand up and back to sitting. It's light enough to easily move it from under my desk to the top of my desk. I put my keyboard on the table top and have a corner shelf above that allows me to place my light weight monitors on top. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: I'll try anything once

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Two things I wish this had was more notches to lower the angle the center piece raises up to and a way to better either secure the drawer in the side or hold the tray when carrying it. It’s also really long, so it’s helpful when I want to have other things on my tray but definitely makes it heavier (which I assumed when I bought it, but haven’t needed the length as much as I thought I’d use it - personal preference.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to assemble- just place it into the marked holes
customer_reviews.text: This table is well made. The legs extend too. The table tilts well and at several different angles. There's also a cup holder and a little drawer to the right to stow items. I initially thought that the piece to rest the computer on was missing but discovered the piece in the drawer: It is very easy to assemble- just place it into the marked holes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa O.

customer_reviews.title: This desk is sturdy, great for WFH and studying. Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for working from home and it very sturdy. I like spacious ledges on both sides and the small drawer on the side. Can't fit very much just maybe post-it notes and small items but still handy to have. I also like the cup space but I do wish it was a bit deeper since it's pretty easy to tip over your drink. Another improvement might be a small ledge to hold pens in place without them rolling over.
customer_reviews.author: ae_312

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, very nice craftsmanship. After knee surgery I was bed ridden for a period of time. This unit functioned as described and was very helpful. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Fiduccia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item after I saw the one that my boyfriend ordered. It's a gorgeous product! I love the edge in the middle that's removable - so you can use it to hold books while you're reading or remove it for a flat surface. The holes for laptop cooling are also a huge plus. One minor issue I found is that the drawer on the side is held in place by a small magnet. My magnet came out of the hole, so the drawer doesn't stay closed. However, a small bit of super glue or wood glue will probably take care of that. This product is a GREAT buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needes
customer_reviews.text: This laptop desk is the perfect length to fit my 17" laptop and mousepad. It is very sturdy and well made. The legs do not lock so be aware the they can easily fold inward, especially on uneven surfaces (bed etc...) ., however for me it has not been an issue as of yet. The price is $10 lower now then when I purchased it, I should have waited a week longer I guess.
customer_reviews.author: LKF

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful desk for when you need to work from home and sick in bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I will use this for studying and reading at leisure. It has adjustable legs for a closer view of your books or laptop. This desk has a drawer for pens so that you don't have to get up because of running out of ink. It's a perfect tool for the couch as well. You can
customer_reviews.author: Zengirl76

customer_reviews.title: Light, but durable.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a year so far. My daughter uses it in twin bed and on the floor. Practical. Light, but durable.
customer_reviews.author: Good to Remember

customer_reviews.title: sturdy. It withstands my cat
customer_reviews.text: sturdy. It withstands my cat, being dropped. dropping things on it... Holds up really well. it is a little hard to clean if something gets spilled on it. but over all decent
customer_reviews.author: Roy Ja'arven

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Literally as described. Like everyone else says, the drawer magnet is kinda weak. I knew that going in. I only use the drawer to temporarily hold a pen or bookmark anyway while I'm using the desk. Most of the time it is collapsed and lies on its side next to my bed. I like seeing the bamboo grain.
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: You can play "Magic The Gathering" on them comfortably too. lol
customer_reviews.text: Got three of these for my 3 kids in their 20's. You don't just have to use this for your laptop! You can play "Magic The Gathering" on them comfortably too. lol! A significant plus over the others is the extra 7 inches of length. Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Americanwumn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few years now and absolutely love it! Very durable! Nothing has faded, chipped or broke yet!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin, H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good size table, could accommodate a laptop and a writing pad at the same time. Unfortunately the drawer is useless and not removable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Georgescu

customer_reviews.title: I'm very impressed with the quality and the bamboo is really sturdy. It is easy to raise and lower the ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk has worked perfectly for me. I have had it for about a month now. I'm very impressed with the quality and the bamboo is really sturdy. It is easy to raise and lower the legs and there are multiple options for raising the middle. Overall, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: lindymindy11

customer_reviews.title: For the multi-purpose freak in your life!
customer_reviews.text: I love anything that can be used for many things and for this price and it's sturdiness, it's definitely worth the purchase. I had to modify it a bit so the legs sit more upright.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad stand. Great size
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad stand. Great size. Room for things on both sides with a large laptop in the middle. Just hoping that it doesn't get destroyed over time with pretty warm gaming laptop and sometimes moisture from cups or hot bowls of food.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for larger people
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is height adjustable and fits my 17" laptop. I am a plus size woman and the legs are wide enough to fit over my lap with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Hwnatheart

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Tried several that did not work, but this one works great. Lightweight and easy to handle. Great design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bed laptop table on the market for the value!!
customer_reviews.text: This table/desk is perfect. I have a 17" laptop and it fits perfectly. Looks great and seems to be very sturdy. The middle that raises is such a great thing to help you with your proper placement of hands so you are not stressing your wrists. The telescoping legs are adjustable to what ever height you need as well as being able to move the adjustment on each individual leg allows you to basically level your desk on the bed. Easy to fold legs up and out for easy storage under he bed even with my laptop still on the table. I wish I had found this table sooner, it's well workers the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Monette

customer_reviews.title: I love almost everything about this tray
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this tray. The adjustment knobs on the feet that allow you to raise the height of the tray can come loose on their own from time to time, but it’s easy enough to remedy. Everything else about the tray (size, function, quality) is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cristi M.

product_meta.title: SONGMICS Large Right-Left Handed Laptop Desk Bamboo Bed Tray Tilting Top Drawer
feature_bullets: SAY BYE TO ERGONOMIC NIGHTMARES: Often spend hours in bed or on the couch with your laptop? Then you definitely need this SONGMICS laptop desk! It will lift your device to eye level and help you work in comfort, reducing your chances of neck or back pain

NOT ONLY FOR RIGHT-HANDED: With a symmetrical desktop design, this table ensures there’s enough mouse space on both sides for left and right-handed people alike, giving left-handed workers the lucky break they needed

KEEP YOUR LAPTOP COOLER: Can’t bear burning your legs from an overheating laptop? Say hello to this laptop desk with fan-shaped air holes! It reduces the chances for overheating, giving your laptop better performance and a longer lifespan

A PORTABLE OPTION: If you need to pitch in and do some work while traveling, this lap desk is highly recommended. It weighs only 6.6 lb and folds up easily, so taking this lap desk anywhere is a breeze
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: SONGMICS provides you with professional customer service both before and after your purchase; don’t wait any longer, add this to your home today
